title: Middle English Literature
description:
Matthew Boyd Goldie - Middle English Literature: A Historical Sourcebook
Wiley-Blackwell | 2003 | ISBN: 0631231486 | 344 pages | PDF 

This collection of fourteenth- and fifteenth-century documents is designed for students of Chaucer and Middle English literature. It makes readily available accounts of key historical events and descriptions of pertinent cultural phenomena. Brings together in one volume fourteenth- and fifteenth-century historical and cultural texts. Documents shed light on the themes and styles that appear in Chaucer and other Middle English literature. Contains twelve important images from the period.

Concise introductions and bibliographies accompany all documents.
